long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shape AI enhances software productivity with intelligent tooltips and workflow automation. It offers a no-code platform to build, test, and deploy AI features quickly, integrating capabilities such as click steps, screen reading, and data enrichment. Shape AI aims to boost user engagement and productivity through custom AI agent features that provide real-time assistance. The platform is designed for seamless integration and quick deployment, allowing businesses to create branded AI experiences that drive user growth and efficiency.

For more details, visit tryshape.ai
